nothing-selected: Select either a label or a relation to edit it here.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Label
deleteDialog.description: Associated nodes will not be visible in the tool anymore!

nameDuplicate.title: Name taken
nameDuplicate.description: Another label already has this name!

updateSuccess.title: Label updated
updateSuccess.description: Some nodes may appear different now.

updateConflicts.title: Conflicts! Update cancelled
updateConflicts.description: If you know what you are doing you can force the update!

deleteDialog.title: Delete Relation
deleteDialog.description: Relations could lose their actual reference!

nameDuplicate.title: Name taken
nameDuplicate.description: Another relation already has this name!

updateSuccess.title: Relation updated
updateSuccess.description: Some relations may appear different now.

updateConflicts.title: Conflicts! Update cancelled
updateConflicts.description: If you know what you are doing you can force the update!

nameRequired.title: Name required
nameRequired.description: One attribute still needs a name!

nameDuplicate.title: Name duplicate
nameDuplicate.description: The attribute {name} is defined multiple times!

conflictView.title: Conflicts
conflictView.descriptionBoth: {missingError} items miss mandatory attributes and {parseError} items have conflicting fields!

updateDialog.title: Force Update?
updateDialog.description: Granalyzer will use default values for conflicting fields! Deleted attributes will be ignored!
